content.rendered:
SHOP D’LASHES FAVORITES

Time to stock up on your favorite products and make those lash appointments for the holidays! My favorite products that I’m loving this season is this classic Balenciaga bag but with a modern logo. This bag goes with everything and is a great investment item. As a business owner, I’m super busy and when I need to run out the door my favorite easy to put on beauty products are my half D’Sexy lashes, a bold red/berry lip, a cool hair accessory, and a statement bag.

When I get home I always look forward to lighting my favorite black edition D’Lashes scented candles. I really think that candles just add a little bit of magic to your evenings, and just makes the night feel relaxing and special. The D’Lashes candle is hand-poured and made with soy and coconut. Perfect as a holiday gift! D’Lashes candles are available on D’Lashes.com. 

My favorite forever look is a classic black power suit. A good suit and a sharp blazer have been in style since forever. It always looks amazing on pretty much anyone and looks well put together. Just wearing a power suit makes me feel like I can take on the world and conquer anything.

Balenciaga bag is from FWRD.COM as well as the Saint Laurent hair clip. Our A-List lashes, candles, and beauty products are available on DLASHES.COM/shop.

P.S. Let’s book those lash extensions appointments early during the busy holiday season! For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here.

XO XO, DIONNE
